document_data.caption: Map showing Al-Zalim River near [[Muluk]].
document_data.name: Al-Zalim River
document_data.mainbody: '''Al-Zalim River''' was the lifeblood of [[Muluk]], the City of Kings, in the [[Free Cities of Zakhara|Free Cities]] of [[North Zakhara]].
document_data.Geography: The river began its short trek to the [[Great Sea]] in the peaks of the [[Furrowed Mountains]] found southeast of Muluk.
document_data.Description: Fertile lands were found along each bank of Al-Zalim, allowing Muluk to grow and prosper as a city.
